summary: This bill, the Incentivizing Readiness and Environmental Protection Integration Sales Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale of qualified real property interests (like land) to a qualified organization when the sale is related to the Department of Defense's Readiness and Environmental Protection Integration (REPI) program. It defines qualified real property interest, REPI purposes, and qualified organization. There are limitations for pass-through entities. The amendments apply to taxable years beginning after the bill's enactment.
